arts.ttl: Bristol City hit back to see off Southampton
arts.sum: Scott Twine netted a second-half double as Bristol City came from behind to go fourth in the Sky Bet Championship table with a 3-1 victory over Southampton at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: Bristol City vs Southampton predictions: Saints can frustrate hosts
arts.sum: Aidan Perkins thinks Bristol City's home clash with Southampton in the Championship could end all square.

arts.ttl: All 12 Championship midweek games predictions - Week 11
arts.sum:
Frank Lampard's Coventry City lead the way in the Championship, but face a tricky trip to Portsmouth hoping to protect, or even extend, their advantage at the top of the table.

That is one of 12 matches in a full midweek programme in the second tier and here is how we see the games panning out.

arts.ttl: “A bit alarming”: Bristol City vs Southampton predictions
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Bristol City vs Southampton predictions ahead of the Championship clash on Tuesday night. The post “A bit alarming”: Bristol City vs Southampton predictions appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's Championship clash between Bristol City and Southampton, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
